title: Analog scanner not scanning
description: Analog scanner was not scanning during last attempt; needs investigation.

title: Remove Nissan Stadium profile from analog scanner profiles and UI
description: Remove Nissan Stadium profile from analog scanner profiles and the UI.

title: Update git on the pi so pushes are faster
description: Git already up to date on Pi; remote operations are fast (ls-remote ~0.45s).

title: Avoids work and output somewhere
description: Confirm avoids work and get avoids logged show summary on the ui.

title: New design for gain/sq sliders
description: Something lager on the screen esp for iphone ui. Also adjust graduation to the real rtl-sdr gain steps and make the sq a simeple 1-10 scale.

title: Last hit not updating in UI
description: Last hit pill shows but does not update; verify logging and data source.

title: what does refresh button on ui do?
description: Clarify function of refresh button on UI; document behavior.

title: is the squelch working properly?
description: Airband profile: gain <20 and squelch at 8 yields lots of noise pops; traffic sounds scratchy (may be location).Need higher gain but squelch at 9-10 does not suppress noise. Check if other profiles show same behavior.

title: Two columns on the ui for profiles
description: Add a second column on the UI for profiles to reduce scrolling; implement a grid layout. Remove radio buttons if using grid. Mantain radio button selection behavior.

title: optimize for speed
description: Profile switching is slow (10-15s);investigate optimizations to reduce time from button press to profile active. From transmission hitting the antenna to audio heard.From squelch and gain change to effect heard.
